dcterms:creator: Patrick Lucey
Jeffrey F Cohn
Takeo Kanade
Jason Saragih
Zara Ambadar
Iain Matthews
dcterms:description: The CK+ database contains 123 subjects, each displaying some of the 6 universal expressions plus the non-basic expression contempt. Expressions are prototypical and performed in a controlled lab environment with no head pose variation.
dcterms:title: CK+ (Extended Cohn-Kanade database)

dcterms:creator: Lijun Yin
Xiaochen Chen
Yi Sun
Tony Worm
Michael Reale
dcterms:description: The BU-4D database contains 101 subjects, each one displaying 6 acted categorical facial expressions with moderate head pose variations. Expressions are performed with lower intensity and greater variability than in CK+.
dcterms:title: BU-4D (BU-4DFE database)

dcterms:creator: Abhinav Dhall
Roland Goecke
Simon Lucey
Tom Gedeon
dcterms:description: The SFEW database contains 700 images from 95 subjects displaying 7 facial expressions in a real-world environment. Data was gathered from video clips using a semi-automatic labelling process.
dcterms:title: SFEW (Static Facial Expression in the Wild database)

dcterms:creator: Xing Zhang
Lijun Yin
Jeffrey F Cohn
Shaun Canavan
Michael Reale
Andy Horowitz
Peng Liu
Jeffrey M Girard
dcterms:description: The BP4D database contains 41 subjects, each performing 8 tasks that give rise to 8 spontaneous expressions. The authors extracted subsequences for manual FACS annotations.
dcterms:title: BP4D (BP4D database)

dcterms:creator: S Mohammad Mavadati
Mohammad H Mahoor
Kevin Bartlett
Philip Trinh
Jeffrey F Cohn
dcterms:description: The DISFA database contains videos of 27 subjects recorded while watching an emotive video stimulus. Data have been manually labeled frame by frame for 12 AUs on a 6-level scale.
dcterms:title: DISFA (Denver Intensity of Spontaneous Facial Actions)
